abstract: Congressional Memo; passage of Pres Obama's trade bill depends largely on measure of trust between pro-trade Democrats and Republicans, element that has been lacking in Congress for long time; at issue is Republican promise to include worker assistance provision in bill, providing pro-trade Democrats with something to appease their liberal constituents.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s trade bill now hinges on a complex brew of congressional relationships, procedural rigmarole and several leaps of faith across party lines.

headline.main: Trade Bill’s Fate Rests on What’s Been Missing in Congress: Trust
headline.print_headline: Trade Bill’s Fate Rests on Something That’s Been Lacking in Congress: Trust

snippet: President Obama’s trade bill now hinges on a complex brew of congressional relationships, procedural rigmarole and several leaps of faith across party lines.
